text: The ancient 'Kynges Towne' of Brading is the main town of the civil parishEnglish Parishes & Welsh Communities N&C; 2004 of the same name, which used to cover about a tenth of the Isle of Wight but now includes the town itself and Adgestone, Morton, Nunwell and other outlying areas between Ryde, St Helen's, Bembridge, Sandown and Arreton. == References == Category:Towns on the Isle of Wight
title: Brading
